title: Great app
comment: Does the job well, very usable. Wonder if it can install itself as a custom keyboard so it's easier to use from other apps?

title: Awesome!
comment: Love this application.
TLD Option?
Not new user

title: Not so pretty
comment: Sometimes even the ugly ones get the girl. I mean get the job done.

title: Simple, works
comment: Works perfectly on every device I have it installed on, generates the hashes just like SGP.com. Suggestion for future improvement: remember generated hash length per domain. I use default of 10, but the occasional site still has an 8 character limit.

I'm trying to avoid having it remember things, so that it doesn't become a central point of failure. It presently doesn't have a way to backup its data, but if I added any more data storage, I'd need to add backup. What about a JSON to email export or something like that?

title: Great for quick passwords
comment: Handy for making quick passwords on the go. 5 stars if I can switch the generated pass length & salt/master passwd from main screen.

Do you want to switch them because you use different ones on each site, or as a way to transition from an old master password/generation scheme? I was thinking of adding the ability to have a list of password length, salt, and algorithm settings that you can change from the main screen. Would this work for you?

title: Brilliant
comment: Been using for ages. Would have been PERFECT if the length field is on the main page.

title: Perfect
comment: Very simple app, no permissions needed and does its job flawlessly

title: Nice app
comment: Very useful and stable app. It would be better if master password could be remembered for session for example.

title: Aesthetic issues for an otherwise fantastic app.
comment: The new icon is really not well designed, but the real issue is the text "SuperGenPass" causes the last "s" to be displayed on a second line (i.e. a page-return), which really looks awful in the drawer. Please fix this so this otherwise outstanding app could be 5-star worthy.  Reply to Dev Comment: The original icon was better than the key you replaced it with. Suggestions for titling could be to just insert a space. i.e. Super GenPass or Super Genpass

As the hashing system is called, "SuperGenPass" (without spaces) there's not a lot of wiggle room for changing the name so it wraps better. I'm open to suggestions, though! As far as the icon: unfortunately, I'm not a graphics designer and no one else has volunteered anything better (yet!).

title: Great
comment: Been using this app for ages. Great for supergenpass users on Android!

title: Works well, fast
comment: I have been using this for a few months now and it works fast with no force closes. The password visual hashing is a good idea and now I have different passwords for every forum as recommended without overloading my brain. If there was a way to export the domain list or save it that would be great, possibly with password protection.
Exporting the list of domains sounds like a useful feature. Would a JSON export to either the SD card or a Share intent (email, etc.) make sense to you?

title: Best App of its kind!!!
comment: Nothing compares to this. The idea is genius and minimal as can be. Great job dev I'm impressed. Keep up your great work!

title: Incredibly useful
comment: This app is a must have for anyone who wants to have their online identities secured.  No more 'one password fits all!'

title: Excellent
comment: Great app to calculate your passwords and save to the clipboard, loses one star as there's no option to see your master password as you enter it

title: Works
comment: Wish it could integrate with all apps on the system
I wish it could too! Android is very open, but not all apps make it possible to integrate. I personally use Notification Toggle to put SGP in my notification bar (along with a bunch of other stuff).
Up.

title: SGP's the best
comment: Learn how to use it, and you can forget about password managers. Can't believe why some people mark this down because of icon design.

title: Excellent app
comment: Allows you to generate passwords easily. Requires no permissions so there is no chance of leaking info. Don't know if it's secure to leave PW on clipboard, but it's easy to copy something else

title: Wow!
comment: That visual hash idea is rather clever! Awesome job!! Btw, people 1-starring this just for a difference of opinion about the app icon are beyond petty. Grow up!

title: Icon issue
comment: New icon is ugly.
awesome!

title: Better as an input method?
comment: I love this app, so 5 stars. Can't help but feel it might be better as an "input method" (keyboard) though

title: Nice
comment: My faithful sidekick.

title: Works.
comment: Wish it could be integrated into the OS to work inside all apps natively.  Might be something to request in cyanogenmod.
Very useful
So nice to be able to have this option on my phone. I just wish I didn't have to go to a browser or physical app to run.

title: Not as conveniet as the browser
comment: plugin but more secure.

title: Good
comment: Idea
Great app - works perfectly.
SuperGenPass is great and this app brings it to mobile. Loving it!
B
Awesome, good security is priceless
Best password management solution out there. Use it for all my passwords.
Add ability to launch via hotkey so I can launch from within browser or apps. Vibrant don't have hotkeys built in boo
After the time wasted with the other password apps, this is the real deal. Thanks!
I have it bound to search+p for quick access. Would be even better if it was an "input method"
Works good but should allow selection of length and choice of special characters
This is one of my most used apps. Thankyou so much for bringing it to Android.
This is a must have app for people want to secure their accounts. Using over a year. Good work.
Have been using SuperGenPass for years! It is a wonderful security password program. Am glad it came to Android!
Thanks! I use this at home with Firefox. Very useful to now have on my Droid. :)
Call me stupid but the generated p.w its provides look pretty random to me.
Thanks for bringing this awesome tool to android!!
great app! thanks for implementing this excellent piece of software.
Cool as hell hella hella hella
SuperGenPass is a brilliant idea, and this Android implementation of it is flawless.
Awesome. Highly useful.
Useful
A must if you use passwords anywhere and since everyone does...
Excellent, thanks!  I'm about to email you some changes to your source which adds support for a salt value as per the advanced online version of SGP
Awesome.  I've used this on my desktop for ages. Easier to use than the mobile version as you can copy the domain in a couple of clicks.
Awesomeness! A must-have app if you want to have more secure passwords on a mobile device
For people who like to tie their passwords to a specific site to make it easier to remember, this is awesome!
